Posts.HTML:
I'm sorry if I posted this in the wrong place.

See, the English language is in second person right?
Eg.- "You open " + object.article + "."
Well, I have made a new first-person version!
Eg.- "I open " + object.article + "."

Actually, it is kind of simple to make, but who wants to go through that much hard work?
English First Person.aslx
